m20.title: Five Nights at Freddy's
m20.stars: Josh Hutcherson, Matthew Lillard, Mary Stuart Masterson
m20.description: Set in Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, a darker version of Chuck-E-Cheese, an animatronic animal band performs kiddy songs by day, and goes on murderous rampages by night. Based on the video game series.

m20.title: The Japanese Wife Next Door
m20.description: An outrageous and insanely over the top erotic ('Pinku') movie that delights in breaking several taboos, in the unique way that just a Pinku movie can!  The narrative starts using office worker Takashi, who shares a drink one night with two women (Mina and Sakura).  Fate intervenes and then he subsequently ends up marrying Sakura (played with busty JAV Idol, Reiko Yamaguchi).  The newlywed couple go into Takashi's home (distributed to his sister, dad and grandfather), but Sakura's nymphomaniac sexdrive soon starts to cause anxieties.   When Takashi begins to moan in his marital commitments, Sakura turns to the remainder of your family in order to satisfy her nympho excitement....
